"JE Bennett Law is a private client law firm which specialises in providing legal services to the vulnerable client. We pride ourselves on our holistic approach to our clients’ needs."

- Jane Bennett, Managing Director and Senior Partner

Our core business areas

Vulnerable client law

Our wealth of experience enables us to represent vulnerable clients with a range of injuries; disabilities and concerns arising from getting older. We also assist their family members and in many cases, are involved for the duration of the vulnerable party’s life.

Read more

Expert witness

Jane Bennett acts as an expert witness in catastrophic high value insurance claims for a range of leading claimant and defendant law firms across England and Wales, regarding the role of a professional property and affairs deputy under the Court of Protection, and associated issues such as costs; health and welfare; best interests and safeguarding aspects.

Read more

Training

Jane and the team offer a broad range of seminars aimed at the older client in the local community. Jane offers regular specialist legal seminars farther afield.

Read more

Working for the family of those lacking mental capacity, the injured party, the elderly and other vulnerable groups

See all the people we can help

Helping vulnerable people to get the legal help they need
